ing: 2 fluid ounces silver tequila (such as PatronÂ®)
1/4 cup club soda, or as needed
des: "A yummy twist on the classic mojito."
ins: Combine tequila, mint leaves, sugar, and lime wedges in a tall glass; vigorously stir the mixture, crushing mint with the back of a spoon to release oils and squeezing juice from the lemon wedges. Top with club soda and stir gently to serve.
